Type.Name: CellRendererMode

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CellRendererMode extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Identifies how the user can interact with a particular cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererMode Activatable = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererMode Editable = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The cell can be edited or otherwise modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.CellRendererMode Inert = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The cell is just for display and cannot be interacted with.
Docs.remarks: Note that this does not mean that the row being drawn can not be selected, for example. Just that a particular element of it cannot be individually modified.
